articles.title: Forza Horizon 6 Set in Japan, Launches in 2026 For PC and Xbox First, Then PlayStation 5 After - IGN
articles.description: Forza Horizon 6, the next entry in Microsoft's racing series, will be set in Japan and launch in 2026.

articles.title: Microsoft forced to make Windows 10 extended security updates truly free in Europe - The Verge
articles.description: You won’t have to enable Windows Backup to get extended Windows 10 security updates in the European Economic Area.

articles.title: Aspyr Brings Deus Ex Remastered To Switch Next February - Nintendo Life
I tested the iPhone 17 Pro Max, and here's one big reason for a year-over-year upgrade - ZDNET
articles.description: Review: While I don't usually advise upgrading to the flagship iPhone if you have last year's model, there's one particularly hot factor to consider in 2025.

articles.title: Nintendo’s new Fire Emblem mobile game has an Among Us-style twist - The Verge
articles.description: Fire Emblem Shadows is a new mobile spinoff of Nintendo’s strategy series. It follows Fire Emblem Heroes, which has been a big hit for the company.
